- - - - - - -body { - display: flex; - justify-content: center; - align-items: center; - height: 100vh; - background-color: #222; - margin: 0; - color: #fff; - font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif; -} +$(document).ready(function() { + function updateClock() { + var now = moment(); + var hours = now.format('HH'); + var minutes = now.format('mm'); + var seconds = now.format('ss'); -.clock { - display: flex; - justify-content: center; - align-items: center; -} + $('#hours .top').text(hours); + $('#hours .bottom').text(hours); + $('#minutes .top').text(minutes); + $('#minutes .bottom').text(minutes); + $('#seconds .top').text(seconds); + $('#seconds .bottom').text(seconds); + } -.flip-clock { - display: flex; -} - -.digit { - position: relative; - width: 60px; - height: 90px; - margin: 0 5px; - background-color: #333; - border-radius: 5px; - overflow: hidden; - color: #fff; - text-align: center; - font-size: 2em; - font-weight: bold; -} - -.digit .top, .digit .bottom { - position: absolute; - width: 100%; - height: 50%; - background-color: #333; - transition: transform 0.6s; -} - -.digit .bottom { - top: 50%; -} - -.digit .top { - top: 0; - transform: translateY(0); -} - -.digit .bottom { - transform: translateY(100%); -} - -.digit.flipping .top { - transform: translateY(-100%); -} - -.digit.flipping .bottom { - transform: translateY(0); -} - - - - - - Horloge Flip - - - - - - -
